stable.changelog:

- (FIX) Navigation bar transparency
- (FIX) Hardcoded shared preference style

beta.changelog:
- (NEW) Update themed icon design
- (NEW) Now you can choose which app you want use to apply translucid theme background
- (INT) Ignore EXIF info for image orientation and force use device screen orientation
- (FIX) Security tab crash wen clicked
- (FIX) Remove block screenshots option (for now)
- (INT) Cleaning activity, services e providers
- (INT) Small improvements and fixes
